about_the_game:
In the shadow-drenched realm where modern warfare intertwines with necromantic horrors, we have conjured an unparalleled adventure. Forge your arsenal from an evolving deck of cards, face legions of the undead delvers, unearth artifacts of might and vanquish the darkness that festers down the Crypt!

Chronicles of the Crypt


Shadow Arsenal Assembly: With sagacity and valor, select your armaments. Amongst the spoils of each incursion into the Crypt lie hundreds of mystical cards. Weave your techniques and tactics into a symphony of destruction, ensuring your ascendancy over the malevolent entities that dwell within.

The Shifting Crypt: No two forays into the Crypt's abyss are the same. The tomb's malevolent magic warps its own halls and chambers with each new moon. Choose your path with care—through perilous corridors or hidden enclaves. Encounter fell creatures, bind new techniques into your deck, discover relics of forbidden power, and face the nightmarish guardians that await.

Relics of Eldritch Might: Scattered throughout the Nightcrypt are relics of ancient and terrible potency. Their powers can turn the tide of battle, weaving with your cards to unleash cataclysmic combinations. But be forewarned, for such power does not come without peril—some relics demand sacrifices far greater than mere coin...

With the breaking of the dawn, the Crypt has awakened, unveiling (so far!):

  • Three base unique classes with thoughtful progression.
  • Over 100 spells and incantations, ready to be woven into your deck.
  • More than 100 relics and talismans, each bearing secrets untold.
  • In excess of 50 encounters with the Crypt's most vicious defenders.
  • Over 50 enigmas and trials that may bless or blight your campaign.

    Step forth and claim your fate, for the Nightspire awaits those both brave and cunning enough to dare its heights.
